name: Dance Dance Revolution: Best Hits
overview: Dance Dance Revolution BEST HITS is a music video game that is part of the Dance Dance Revolution series. It is developed and produced by Konami, and was released in Japan on December 21, 2000 for the PlayStation video game console. The game, as the title implies, is a compilation of some of the most popular songs at the time, from the 1st to 3rd Mixes. There was no arcade counterpart. While BEST HITS uses the interface from Dance Dance Revolution 3rdMix, the characters Jenny and Johnny from Dance Dance Revolution 4thMix make an appearance. The other characters are in their 3rdMix outfits. One of the new features is the Lesson Mode: Here the game teaches the basics of DDR. Other mode that are back are the Training Mode, Edit Mode, and the Arcade Mode.
